Detailed guide to my own run of Lazy Bastard (<111 crafts) for Factorio. This guide is based off of a [Reddit post](https://www.reddit.com/r/factorio/comments/4qjq8g/a_quick_start_guide_to_the_lazy_bastard/).

# Map Seed
My seed [^1] that I use for settings per [Nilaus guide](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Biz_dVyoue8)

# Crafted Items

* 1 Boiler
* 1 Steam Engine
* 1 Offshore Pump
* 1 Lab
* 1 Small Electric Pole
* 10 Science Pack 1

# Gathered Items

* 104 Iron Plates
* 34 Copper Plates
* 1 Wood
* 37 Coal 

----

# Guide Progress

- [x] Create Rep/ init guide
- [x] Start run
- [x] Enable Achievement Tracking (optional, more of a reminder to disable crafting once all items are crafted)
- [x] Gather resources
- [x] Craft *ALL* Items Needed
- [x] Disable Crafting (/permissions disable craft)
- [x] Disable Achievement Tracking for Lazy Bastard (optional
- [ ] Starter Base
- [ ] Mini-Mall
- [ ] Main Bus
- [ ] Regular Run
- [ ] ...
- [ ] Launch Spaceship!

----

# Notes
Huge rocks in this run will be a blessing, though I know that they usually can be a curse. Make sure that the spawn that you get has Crude Oil and Uranium Deposits within the first screen, or re-roll random seed until one is.

I'm doing this run without Biters or Cliffs as I find both to be more of a nuissance than a challange \*shrug*

----

thx, tri
